item.description:
Si un film français vous tente, venez nous rejoindre au Musée des Beaux Arts à Boston. Nous nous réunirons à 3h devant le Remis Auditorium à côté de la billetterie.

Hidden Diary (Les mères et les filles) by Julie Lopes-Curval (2009, 105 min.). Audrey returns to her ancestral home to visit her emotionally distant mother Martine (Catherine Deneuve), who is still tortured by the childhood desertion by her own mother. After Audrey finds a hidden diary calling their family history into question, many more family secrets are revealed. This absorbing melodrama offers a generational look at a far-from conventional mother-daughter dynamic, and in doing so explores the concept of family itself. MFA Members: $8, Non-members: $10
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet near the ticket counter of the Remis Auditorium
item.name: MFA French Film Festival -- Hidden Diary (Les mères et les filles).
